docs.text: 王鹤的博客 For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - 创建一个界面. mkdocs serve - 每次更改要改两个分支吗？. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
